channel.title: Minigolf Tournament [Round 2 Started]
channel.description:
ROUND 2 STARTED
I'll continue the [url=http://www.playray.com/play/minigolf/]minigolf tournament[/url] since no one else is going to. If you want to view the champions of old tournaments, [url=http://jaghax.ws/minigolf/index.php]go here[/url] :)
Newbie Bracket:
[img]http://jaghax.ws/minigolf/minigolf2.1.png[/img]
Super Bracket:
[img]http://jaghax.ws/minigolf/minigolf3.1.png[/img]
Rules:
[img]http://jaghax.ws/minigolf/minigolf_rules2.1.png[/img]
[b]Round 1 Ends: [/b]Friday, January 17, 11:59 PM GMT
[hr]
Some explanations:
[i]What happens if I am disconnected during a battle? [/i]If you have overwhelming evidence that you were [i]disconnected[/i] (ie, a screenshot), talk to me about it and I can arrange the redoing of the match before continuing the to the next round.
[i]What happens if my partner doesn't reply to me during the round time? [/i]If you can't contact your partner, provide overwhelming evidence of your activity in order to continue to the next round. Otherwise, which one of you continues to the next round will be randomly chosen.
[i]What is a bye? [/i]A bye is a way to deal with the odd number of people in a bracket round. The person who receives the bye in a particular round is randomly chosen from the other participants of that round. This is the fairest way to do it.
[i]Which play mode do we use? [/i]You can do either multiplayer or dual player, but dual player is preferred.

item.title: Minigolf Tournament [Round 2 Started]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

ROUND 2 STARTED

I’ll continue the minigolf tournament since no one else is going to. If you want to view the champions of old tournaments, go here

Newbie Bracket:

Super Bracket:

Rules:

Round 1 Ends: Friday, January 17, 11:59 PM GMT

[hr]

Some explanations:

What happens if I am disconnected during a battle? If you have overwhelming evidence that you were disconnected (ie, a screenshot), talk to me about it and I can arrange the redoing of the match before continuing the to the next round.

What happens if my partner doesn’t reply to me during the round time? If you can’t contact your partner, provide overwhelming evidence of your activity in order to continue to the next round. Otherwise, which one of you continues to the next round will be randomly chosen.

What is a bye? A bye is a way to deal with the odd number of people in a bracket round. The person who receives the bye in a particular round is randomly chosen from the other participants of that round. This is the fairest way to do it.

Which play mode do we use? You can do either multiplayer or dual player, but dual player is preferred.

Read full topic
